misson: I am currently hunting for a cloud/server/administration type role that utilizes my skills in various programming languages, automation, and cloud infrastructure knowledge. My strong understanding of concepts such as CI/CD, client relations, operational security, troubleshooting, and knowledge base article creation make me a valuable asset for any organization.

highlights: Acted as first contact for a company with over 34,000 internal employees.
Developed aptitude in ticket handling and case relations via SNOW and ServiceNow.
Administered and routed thousands of cases via backlogs, incidents, requests and calls.
Created solutions for tough problems facing industry leading engineers and technicians.
Fostered a professional conduct and ease of communication that crossed job-title borders.
Delegated event tickets that affected several hundred users at once.
Cross-trained in many avenues of support, from chats, meetings, calls and email correspondence.
Consulted for Apple brand desktop, handheld and mobile devices.
Examined and documented support tickets relating to user use, repair and service plans.
Troubleshoot with hands-on or remote support.
Assess and communicate to clients and co-wokers about various technical and account issues.
Mastered my customer relation skills, allowing for clear and productive communication.
Earned the opportunity to be trained in several spheres of business.

This will be an external dashboard calling on the API of Cloudwatch alerts set up within my AWS environment.
